attributes.action: Question Time in the House of Commons
attributes.additional_details:
Compel the Prime Minister to give factual answers to questions raised during Question Time and punish MPs who show disrespect by shouting, jeering and  exhibiting other juvenile behaviour during this session.

Action to be taken: prepare and enact whatever procedures it takes to ensure Parliament is able to function and scrutinise officials and elected members, and to ensure some dignity in the Chamber.
